Topic.Title: Here is why all the pathetic Best losers are WRONG!

Message.Msg: So Master? Has Jen become one of your sock puppets too? It sure looks like it. First, you force Jen into paying his first-ever cash dividend in 19 years. With your classic piece, "Jeepers Best, Everybody else pays a dividend." And now you publicly shame him into buying back some stock. There's no doubt about it Master -- Jen listens to you and does what you write.

With your classic piece, "Jeepers Best, Everybody else pays a dividend." And now you publicly shame him into buying back some stock. There's no doubt about it Master -- Jen listens to you and does what you write." Mister Best? And if you could force Jen to kill the Tegra too, why, you would have accomplished a Grand Slam, Hat Trick, Trifecta. Dividend / Stock buy back / Kill the Tegra. Thanks so much in advance, Best. Topic.Title: The Tegra, it is like elephant

Message.Msg: Nvidia villagers paint faces and shout "Kill the Tegra" "Kill the Tegra" Wise council bosses order chief of village to kill Elephant Prosperity returns to village Lesson : Kill the Tegra before it smash and eat village

Topic.Title: ASUS November Monthly Revenue up 12% MOM

Message.Msg: Nov is last month for X'mas and high Nexus 7 sales. Going forward, nothing but down. Even with high Nov sales counted, Tegra sales will go from $240M in Q3 to only $160M in Q4. And with nothing new in the pipe till a year from now, Tegra sales will do down down and down from the Q4's $160M. Loses go the other way, $100M this Q and then up up and up more for all of 2013.

Topic.Title: ASUS November Monthly Revenue up 12% MOM

Message.Msg: The gross margin expansion from Tegra 4 on 28nm vs. 40nm for Tegra 3 will allow Tegra to make money in 2013. More design wins will push Nvidia's mobile division into nice profitability. JMHO

Message.Title: SHORT COVERING?
Message.Msg: FYI-since nothing has changed with the exception of yet another story of NVDA being a take over target, I can only see SHORT COVERING as the momentum here. I am long since I bought in at $11.50 and bought deep in the money CALLS at $8 for 2015 so I am happy but concerned that this is only Short Covering and speculation and nothing really substantial.
I will be expecting for more news.

This nvda rally is real. If your looking for reasons here is one. Asus november revenue is up 12% month over month. Also October Montly Revenue was up 5% Hint: They make the Nexus 7 Co-branded by Google and the VivoTab Rt Win 8 Rt tablet.Good indication of how well Tegra is doing in tablets.

It's a rumor based rally, boys. Yes, Rumor based. The rumor is that Best will successfully force Jen to kill the Tegra. And thereby increase operating profits by One Third (1/3rd). Like he forced Jen to pay a dividend and buy back some stock. So far, it's just a rumor. But knowing best, he'll GIT-R-DONE.
It's TAKEOVER RUMOR's RESSURECTED http://seekingalpha.com/article/1056401-nvidia-as-a-takeover-target?source=yahoo

Message.Msg: NVDA RECENT activity is about M&A. Earnings, sales, and new products mean nothing to investor's. It's about rumors and possible buyouts. This company is not viable. It has no future, it can not compete. Live with it.

Topic.Title: Microsoft Has Increased Production of Surface Tablet - Available at Stables Tomorrow

Message.Msg: Now Best Buy on line Wednesday and all stores Saturday along with Staples tomorrow. Going from 30 Microsoft stores to 1500 Staples and 1200 best buy stores. That's a pretty big jump in retail outlets. Staples is listing Surface with touch cover at $599. $18 cheaper than Microsoft If Best Buy can discount Apple IPhone5 by 25% or $50 what will they do with the Surface.

This is a seasonal rally lead by techs...possibly news getting out and a lot of speculation about future tablet sales and buying ahead of CES. Not to worry, volume like that is not just your average retail investor - these are institutional pushes. There is too much upside here to keep the price down. 18 by years end. Just my .02.

Topic.Title: Microsoft Has Increased Production of Surface Tablet - Available at Stables Tomorrow

Message.Msg: This is good news no doubt. Everything is ripe for a nice run into the end of January - hopefully a few small pullbacks so I can buy more. :-)

Message.Title: What have I been telling you short?
Message.Msg: Among holdings in which Tudor Investment increased its stake was NVIDIA (Nasdaq: NVDA ) . With Texas Instruments (Nasdaq: TXN ) bowing out recently, NVIDIA becomes the second-largest mobile-application processor company. Some have questioned whether its new cloud technology will eat away at its main bread and butter. It may be the right strategy, though, and in the meantime, NVIDIA should benefit from expected growth of roughly 36% for global smartphones over the coming years. Its strong balance sheet and solid cash-flow generation are pluses, and its valuation, with a forward P/E ratio of 11, is attractive as well. tsk, tsk, tsk...
